file_content.text: I'm finally a Jedi Knight--and I owe it all to you.
Kira Carsen, Jedi Knight. I like the sound of that.
The best part about being a Knight is I can stop calling you "Master."
This Council meeting ought to be interesting. They owe you their lives.
If we don't get out of here, we're dead.
This Child is unfinished. Weak. I will make her strong.
Now you will die. Even if my Child must die with you.
No... I won't kill for you!
You're resisting him. Keep it up!
Fight him, Kira!
You're stronger than the dark side. Push it back. I'll help you.
You can do this, Padawan.
You already did.
You're a threat, Padawan. Destroy yourself, or I'll do it for you.
Then die for me.
I won't die, either!
The dark side has no power over me. I am a Jedi!
He's gone. I won. I'm finally free.
Your life is your own, Kira.
Yes, it's over.
And I have you to thank, Master.
What was it like under the Emperor's control? Were you aware of our duel?
How much do you remember?
Everything. Especially you telling the Emperor he could have me.
All of it. I was in my head the whole time, like a prisoner.
This ship's coming down on top of us. Let's get out of here.
This could all be a trick. I've never trusted you. Never will.
I don't believe that.
Believe what you want, but this ship's coming down on top of us. You want to stand around accusing me, or run for it?
Angral's dead--and this battle cruiser's not far behind him.
Disappointing. Angral was useful.
This Child must learn her place... and so will you.
Leave Kira alone. If you want to fight, face me in person.
Release my Padawan.
That is unnecessary.
Whatever you are... you won't win.
Not again.
Have your little puppet, Emperor. For as long as she lasts, anyway.
If you want Kira, take her.
Long enough.
I see futures in you. Futures I will not allow. Your future ends here.
Angral pulled out all the stops for us. We must be doing something right.
